about_the_game:
Create and Customize Your Own Universe

Begin a personalized gaming experience by creating an unknown but customizable universe. The background of the universe can be changed according to your personal taste.

Rise to Power: Balancing Economy and Rivalry

You must build your economic strength and use it to influence and control your environment. But as you grow, rivals will notice your rise, and enemies will emerge. Expansion will inevitably bring the risk of plunder, but your ultimate goal remains clear: to expand beyond borders that do not belong to you.

Battle of the Galactic Monopoly

Your initial weakness will strengthen your hand in negotiations, but as you grow, your opponents will use their soft and hard power against you. Are you ready to strike harder to break this monopoly? If so, you will need a good army and good tactics, but it will cost you in manpower and money. It will be a journey from looting their ATMs and damaging their stations to completely destroying other banks. You'll be in space, but you may need to keep your planet under control and get away with your intrigues.

content_descriptors.notes: We want to provide you with important information about the mature content featured in our game. Our game explores themes such as warfare, deception, and societal turmoil, offering a narrative that delves into the complexities of these subjects.
